name: ioeX
description: • Architecture based on distributed networks, combining the internet, IoT and blockchain solutions. • Provide chipset vendors, equipment manufacturers, software companies or solution providers with increased data file transfer, exchange and information communication capabilities. • Significantly reduce operation costs for enterprises, making commercial and crowd applications practical. • Users can choose to share bandwidth and storage space by using the ioeX P2P network feature and receive ioeX coins as a reward.
